statements: SELECT * FROM flight_schedules;
SELECT airline_name, route_from, route_to, departure_time FROM flight_schedules;
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, route_to FROM flight_schedules WHERE departure_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM flight_schedules WHERE route_from = 'New York' AND route_to = 'London';
SELECT flight_id, airline_name, arrival_time FROM flight_schedules ORDER BY arrival_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM flight_schedules WHERE airline_name = 'Delta Airlines' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT flight_id, route_from, route_to FROM flight_schedules WHERE arrival_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT airline_name, COUNT(*) AS total_flights FROM flight_schedules GROUP BY airline_name HAVING total_flights > 10 ORDER BY total_flights DESC;
SELECT * FROM flight_schedules WHERE route_from = 'New York' AND route_to = 'Los Angeles' AND departure_time > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY departure_time;
SELECT MAX(arrival_time) AS latest_arrival FROM flight_schedules;
SELECT * FROM flight_schedule WHERE flight_id = 1;
SELECT airline_name, origin_airport, destination_airport FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_time >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM airline WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT airline_name, headquarters_location FROM airline WHERE established_year > 2000;
SELECT flight_id, origin_airport, arrival_time FROM flight_schedule WHERE destination_airport = 'Paris';
SELECT * FROM flight_schedule WHERE origin_airport = 'JFK';
SELECT airline_name, origin_airport, destination_airport FROM flight_schedule WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT airline_name, destination_airport FROM flight_schedule WHERE arrival_time < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY arrival_time DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT origin_airport FROM flight_schedule WHERE airline_name = 'Delta';
SELECT f.flight_id, f.departure_time, a.airline_name FROM flight_schedule f JOIN airline a ON f.airline_name = a.airline_name WHERE a.country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM airlines
SELECT airline_name, airline_code FROM airlines
SELECT airline_name, airline_code FROM airlines WHERE airline_id = 1
SELECT * FROM routes
SELECT origin_airport_code, destination_airport_code, distance_km FROM routes
SELECT * FROM airlines;
SELECT airline_name, airline_code FROM airlines ORDER BY airline_name DESC;
SELECT airline_id, airline_name, airline_code FROM airlines WHERE airline_id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM routes WHERE distance_km > 1000 ORDER BY distance_km ASC;

SELECT flights.flight_id, airlines.airline_name, routes.origin_airport_code, routes.destination_airport_code, flights.departure_datetime, flights.arrival_datetime FROM flights JOIN airlines ON flights.airline_id = airlines.airline_id JOIN routes ON flights.route_id = routes.route_id;
SELECT * FROM airlines;
SELECT airline_name FROM airlines ORDER BY airline_name ASC;
SELECT airline_id, airline_name FROM airlines WHERE airline_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM flights WHERE departure_airport_code = 'LAX';
SELECT flight_id, arrival_time FROM flights ORDER BY arrival_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM airlines WHERE airline_id = 1;
SELECT airline_name FROM airlines WHERE airline_id > 3 ORDER BY airline_name DESC;
SELECT airline_name, airport_name, city FROM airlines JOIN airports ON airlines.airline_id = airports.airport_code;
SELECT flight_id, departure_time, arrival_time FROM flights WHERE departure_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY departure_time ASC;

SELECT airlines.airline_name, flights.flight_id, airports.city FROM airlines JOIN flights ON airlines.airline_id = flights.airline_id JOIN airports ON flights.departure_airport_code = airports.airport_code;
SELECT * FROM Flight;
SELECT flight_number, airline_name, origin, destination FROM Flight WHERE airline_name = 'Delta';
SELECT flight_number, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Flight ORDER BY departure_time DESC;
SELECT airline_name, COUNT(*) AS num_flights FROM Flight GROUP BY airline_name HAVING num_flights > 10;
SELECT * FROM Airport WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY airport_name;
SELECT * FROM Flight WHERE origin='New York' AND destination='Los Angeles';
SELECT flight_number, airline_name, departure_time, arrival_time FROM Flight WHERE departure_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY departure_time DESC;

SELECT a.airline_name, r.origin, r.destination, s.departure_date FROM Airline AS a INNER JOIN Route AS r ON a.airline_id = r.airline_id INNER JOIN Schedule AS s ON r.route_id = s.route_id WHERE a.headquarters='USA' ORDER BY s.departure_date ASC;
SELECT airport_name, city, country FROM Airport WHERE city='London' OR country='France';
SELECT airline_name, headquarters FROM Airline WHERE website IS NOT NULL ORDER BY airline_name ASC;
